text: Efraimian anabamɨn adarasi, faragha Gileatɨn adaraziv gɨa ghaze, “Ia Gileatɨn adarasi, ia Efraimɨn nguazimɨn ikegha ara iza, datɨrɨghɨn Efraim ko Manasen nguazimningɨn tɨzimningɨn iti. Egha ia gumazamizir pura guighav itiba.” Kamaghɨn, Jepta Gileatɨn gumaziba bar me akuvagha, Efraimɨn gumazibav sogha me abɨri.12:4 Hibrun akam deragha mɨgɨrɨgɨar kamɨn mɨngarim abɨghizir puvatɨ.
